QUESTION

A friend of the family purchased a lotto ticket and put my mums details in itÂ  while they were on holiday now 2 months later we have received a letter saying that my mum has won some money now i know that lotto is haraam however my mum didnt purchase the ticket therefore she didnt gamble so what is the ruling on this also is it possible to use the money to pay of mortagages and debts which my family have and are paying huge amounts of interest on . i await your response thankyou

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

It is haram to purchase a lotto ticket. If one wins a lotto, the money is also haram. It is not permissible to use that in any way.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
